critique: This document is an executive order that confers civil service status upon specific employees in the Antitrust Division of the Department of Justice. It is based on the Civil Service Act and section 1753 of the Revised Statutes. The order is recommended by the Attorney General and the Civil Service Commission. There is no direct indication of ideological tilt, immigration approach, expansion of executive power, federalism implications, national security concerns, economic regulation, or social inclusion. Therefore, the initial scores are all set to 0.
